price: “Nyagasani wacu! Uzambabarire, njye n’ababyeyi banjye ndetse n’abemeramana, umunsi ibarura ryabaye.”
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
